oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Züchterische Weiterentwicklung samenfester Brokkolisorten für den Ökolandbau hinsichtlich agronomischer wie sensorischer Merkmale
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fleck, Michael
Wolf, Stefanie
Claupein, Wilhelm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Starting from identified breeding populations of broccoli, new open-pollinated broccoli varieties (OP varieties) are to be developed by means of two intensive individual selection steps with progeny testing in an on-farm approach. These new varieties are to meet the demands of organic vegetable production. To achieve this, agronomic characteristics such as yield stability, uniformity, short harvesting period, sufficient firmness of the head are sought after, coupled with good sensory characteristics and high amounts of bioactive substances beneficial to health and excellent taste.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Fleck, Michael; Wolf, Stefanie and Claupein, Wilhelm (2013) Züchterische Weiterentwicklung samenfester Brokkolisorten für den Ökolandbau hinsichtlich agronomischer wie sensorischer Merkmale. Poster at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
